briefTitle: A Long-Term Study of MP-214 in Patients With Receiving Multiple Drugs Schizophrenia
officialTitle: A Long-Term Study of MP-214 in Patients With Receiving Multiple Drugs Schizophrenia
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety, tolerability, and efficacy of MP-214 in patients with receiving multiple drugs schizophrenia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
